body_html:
@soumith, I tried just to check BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE and it worked. Does this solution have any disadvantages?

I dont know how it works. your logs say that the linked BLAS is MKL, which means it goes into the #else condition of BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE which is what is there in current master.
body_text:
@soumith, I tried just to check BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE and it worked. Does this solution have any disadvantages?

I dont know how it works. your logs say that the linked BLAS is MKL, which means it goes into the #else condition of BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE which is what is there in current master.
body:
> @soumith, I tried just to check BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE and it worked. Does this solution have any disadvantages?

I dont know how it works. your logs say that the linked BLAS is MKL, which means it goes into the #else condition of `BLAS_IS_ACCELERATE` which is what is there in current master.
